forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 11. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 29. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As night blankets Boston, the air is crisp and still, a gentle reminder of winter’s persistent embrace. With the temperature dipping to about 11 degrees, the west wind whispers a cool promise, inviting you to layer up. Tonight’s skies are mostly clear, offering a dark canvas dotted with the luminous glow of the city beneath the stars. The clarity of the night suggests a peaceful solitude, a perfect time for a contemplative stroll along the Charles or perhaps a quiet evening while immersing oneself in the comforting glow of indoor warmth.

Tomorrow, the sun will rise bright and bold, bringing with it an invigorating day filled with promise. Expect a high of around 29 degrees, and the calm northwest breezes will lend a refreshing touch. This inviting forecast beckons delightful moments outdoors—perhaps a leisurely walk in one of Boston’s many parks or a visit to a local café, where the world can be watched unfold. Dress warmly, embracing layers and cozy scarves to ward off the chill, but allow the sun’s presence to lift your spirits. As the day unfolds, the city will come alive, a tapestry of everyday charm woven through clear winter air, ideal for those simple pleasures we often overlook in the busyness of life.
